question: Social Endeavour for Health and Telemedicine (SEHAT) scheme is to be launched in which state/UT?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to launch the Social Endeavour for Health and Telemedicine (SEHAT) scheme in Jammu and Kashmir.
This Health Insurance Scheme for the entire Union Territory of Jammu and Kashmir aims to cover the remaining one crore population which was not covered under Ayushman Bharat Scheme. This also enables the UT to achieve Universal Health Coverage.
